items.content_html: ThanksPal is a lightweight, creator-first support platform where fans can show appreciation through small tips and messages. Whether you're an artist, developer, writer, or indie creator, ThanksPal makes it easy to receive support without the fuss.

items.content_html: M3U Playlist Proxy is a lightweight server that lets you stream, customize, and manage IPTV M3U playlists with ease. Whether you're cleaning up bloated channel lists, adding authentication to protect your stream, or just want a better way to serve your playlists â€” this tool gives you full control. With built-in support for filtering, and more

items.content_html: A lightweight, containerized Node.js tool to verify RabbitMQ connectivity. It connects to your server, creates a test exchange and queue, and sends a test messageâ€”ideal for validating credentials, TLS setup, and network access. Just configure your secrets and run with Docker Compose.
items.title: ericwastaken/docker-rabbitmq-connectivity-verifier: A lightweight, containerized Node.js tool to verify RabbitMQ connectivity. It connects to your server, creates a test exchange and queue, and sends a test messageâ€”ideal for validating credentials, TLS setup, and network access. Just configure your secrets and run with Docker Compose.

items.content_html: Streamix is a lightweight reactive library that adopts known RxJS operators while using a simpler, generator-based approach for flexible and efficient data streams.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
